name: ConfirmativeActionButton
body:
### Welcome to the jQuery confirmativeActionButton plugin GitHub Page. [Demo page](https://cdn.rawgit.com/Toocat/ConfirmativeActionButton/master/ConfirmativeActionButton/public_html/demo.html) ### When to Use ? When you don't want to spam users with modal dialogs. ![Example](http://s18.postimg.org/o0gbt82y1/ghbutton.png) ### Ease of Use `$("#someDiv").confirmativeActionButton();` ### Custom styling `$("#someDiv").confirmativeActionButton({`
        `cssNormalClass: "confirmativeActionButtonCustom",`
        `cssWaitingClass: "confirmativeActionButtonWaitingForConfirmationCustom",`
        `cssActivatedClass: "confirmativeActionButtonConfirmedCustom"`
`});` ### API & defaults `id: methods.guid.apply(this)`
`caption: "Confirmative Action Button"`
`confirmationCaption: "Click to confirm"`
`waitingTime: 3000`
`actionHandler: null`
`cssNormalClass: confirmativeActionButton`
`cssWaitingClass: confirmativeActionButtonWaitingForConfirmation`
`cssActivatedClass: confirmativeActionButtonConfirmed`
### Self-destruction `$("#someDiv").confirmativeActionButton({id:"actionButton", actionHandler: function (target) {`
        `target.removeConfirmativeActionButton();`
`}});`
